Title: Erratum: The role of organizational and professional cultures in medication safety: A scoping review of the literature (International Journal for Quality in Health Care DOI: 10.1093/intqhc/mzz111)
Abstract: © The Author(s) 2020. Published by Oxford University Press in association with the International Society for Quality in Health Care. All rights reserved.This manuscript has been amended to correct formatting errors in Figure 2. These errors were corrected by the author at proof stage, but were inadvertently overlooked by the supplier in the final processing of the manuscript. The Publisher apologises for this error, and for any confusion caused.
